Emerging growth company&#160;&#160; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;&#160;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; ITEM&#160;8.01 Other Events. On April&#160;26, 2023, four indirect wholly owned subsidiaries of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. filed voluntary petitions under Chapter 11 of the Bankruptcy code in the United States Bankruptcy Court for the District of New Jersey. The Company issued a press release the following day that provided additional details regarding this matter. A copy of the press release is attached as Exhibit 99.1. &#160; ITEM&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &#160; Exhibit&#160;99.1 &#160;&#160; Berkshire Hathaway Press Release Dated April&#160;27, 2023 Exhibit&#160;104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document). &#160; SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; May&#160;1, 2023 &#160; &#160; BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY INC. &#160; &#160; /s/ Marc D. Hamburg &#160; &#160; By: &#160; Marc D. Hamburg &#160; &#160; Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
